markdownRemark.html: To help COVID-19 frontline workers at UNC Health, Carolinaâ€™s faculty and staff have contributed personal protection equipment and expertise in the form of 3D-printed shields designed by faculty and made by medical students. PPE such as N95 masks, surgical masks and surgical masks with shields protect healthcare workers and patients from exposure to pathogens like the COVID-19 virus.

frontmatter.title: Tar Heels rally to donate personal protection equipment
